text.text_translated: When Pi is 16, a new government is elected that his parents do not support. Worried about the future, his parents decide to close the zoo and move to Canada. Some of the animals are sold to zoos in North America, and the family travels by ship to Canada, taking the remaining animals with them. During the crossing a terrible storm hits, the ship sinks, and tragically the family and the sailors drown. Pi survives in a lifeboat with a hyena, a zebra, an orang‑utan and an enormous tiger. A hyena is a wild meat‑eating animal. A zebra is a striped African animal. An orang‑utan is a large orange‑haired ape. An enormous tiger is a huge striped cat.
